name: Secret Agent 001
description:
Welcome to another mission Mr. Agent 001. Are you ready for a new theft?

The game presents a story from the life of a spy who tries at any cost to reach the secret documents. You are put to many trials before reaching your destination.
Everywhere there are police, traffic lights and all kinds of obstacles that are installed to prevent theft. However, that is why you are chosen :))

We know your previous successful experiences, that's why we need your professionalism once again. Mr. Agent? Ah, you have already disappeared.
This is what we're talking about!
Game Features :
- 30 levels
- 4 Spy characters
- Obstacles (police, signaling, fires)
